DOC.brief_summary: The aim study : - To examine inter-rater reliability ass myofascial trigger point use myotonometer - To determinate strength correlation myotonometric parameter isokinetic parameter - To evaluate sensitivity myotonometric measurement detect location myofascial trigger point
DOC.brief_title: Myotonometric Measurement Myofascial Trigger Points : Reliability , Validity Sensitivity
DOC.detailed_description: Previous research use complicate expensive method measure mechanical property muscle tone like isokinetic dynamometer . The purpose investigation establish reliability , validity sensitivity myotonometer assess myofascial trigger point . The result study verify inter-reliability myotonometer device order evaluate muscle tone , examine correlation association myotonometric measurement isokinetic measurement provide measurable understanding location myofascial trigger point . Assessment : Myoton device simple portable tool obtain quantitative objective assessment mechanical property muscle tone . Isokinetic dynamometric technique consider valid biomechanics method measure muscle tone non-injured subject isokinetic machine heavy expensive equipment . Outcome measure : Myotonometric measure include muscle frequency , decrement ( elasticity ) stiffness . Isokinetic measure include passive resistive torque ankle dorsiflexion dorsiflexion passive range motion ( PROM ) All outcome measure evaluate .
DOC.criteria: Age range 1855 year . Healthy volunteer . Presence latent medial MTrP soleus muscle . Being able provide write informed consent . Being able follow instruction realize clinical test . Any history ipsilateral low limb severe injury intervention ( e.g . fracture , surgical intervention ) . Pain musculoskeletal injury , ligament injury , tendonitis plantar fasciitis ipsilateral leg six month previous evaluation . Peripheral central nervous system neurological disease . Altered sensitivity study area . Treatment myofascial trigger point sural triceps six month previous evaluation .
